title: HOW DAFAWK DO I MAKE A BUG REPORT!!!!!!!!!!
body: I GOT A BUG REPORT AND I LOST A GAME CAUSE IT AND IM REALLY PISSED PLS HELP OR ILL BE EXTRA SALT!

replies.body:
You can click the bug report button in the bottom right of the client!

https://i.gyazo.com/f853fb09d7b56ab236bfd1ce6bbeb8bc.png

You mean you got a bug splat?
I am fairly confident that there is a "send bug report" in that same window.

If you meant a game bug: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

Other than that info I don't think there's anything else to do...
